actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the use of Federal funds to finance, directly or indirectly, the purchase of American agricultural commodities by any communist country.

summary.text: Prohibits the use of Federal funds to finance, directly or indirectly, the purchase of American agricultural commodities by any Communist country, including the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics and the Peoples Republic of China.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the use of Federal funds to finance, directly or indirectly, the purchase of American agricultural commodities by any communist country.
